name: Castle-Crash!
description:
Note: Please wait 3-5 minutes for this game to load in your browser.

Note the Second: Google Chrome doesn't like in-browser games. Try another browser, such as Firefox, for optimal results.

Note the Third: A downloadable version of the game has been made available, in case it doesn't load in your browser.

Description: Castle Crash! is a 2-D Tower Defense game inspired heavily by Kingdom Rush. The point of the game is to stop enemies from invading your castle by placing 'towers' to defend your kingdom.

I enjoyed creating this game - wish I made it a bit longer (its only 1 level) but I digress! Give it a try - its free and fun.
